body_html:
@zheng-xq @aselle I am facing this problem -
E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_blas.cc:367] failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED

Till now I have found 5-6 tensorflow issues with this same problem but no reasonable solution/fix I was able to find in those issues. It will be helpful if someone can post the link to the solution of this issue.
Thank You.

EDIT I solved this issue by uninstalling tensorflow 1.4 and installing tensorflow 1.2. Earlier I had Cuda 8.0.61 with Cudnn 7 and python 2.7 on ubuntu 16.04.
sudo pip install tensorflow-gpu==1.2

body:
@zheng-xq @aselle  I am facing this problem - 
**E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_blas.cc:367] failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED**

Till now I have found 5-6 tensorflow issues with this same problem but no reasonable solution/fix I was able to find in those issues.  It will be helpful if someone can post the link to the solution of this issue. 
Thank You.

**EDIT** I solved this issue by uninstalling tensorflow 1.4 and installing tensorflow 1.2. Earlier I had Cuda 8.0.61 with Cudnn 7 and python 2.7 on ubuntu 16.04.
sudo pip install tensorflow-gpu==1.2
